content: Raathri praarththhana
Praarambhapraarththhana

Urakkamillaattha unarvullllavanaaya ente kartthaave! Ninte unarchaye sthothram cheyyuvaanaayittu paapatthinte muzhukalil ninnu nyangallude urakkatthe unartthaname. Maranamillaattha jeevanullllavane! Ninte karunaye nyangall vandippaanaayitt, maranatthinteyum, naashatthinteyum urakkatthil ninnu nyangallude maranatthe jeevippikkaname. Pithaavum puthranum parishuddha roohaayume! Svargatthilum bhoomiyilum sthuthikkappettavanum vaazhtthappettavanum nee aakayaal ninne sthuthikkunnavaraaya svargeeya maalaakhamaarude mahathvamulllla vyandangallodorumich, vishuddhiyodukoodi ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum ninne sthuthichu vaazhtthuvaan nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Aammeen.
134, 119, 117-aam sangkeertthanangall
Baarekmor: Raathrikaalangallil kartthaavinte bhavanatthil nilkkunnavaraayi/ kartthaavinte sakala daasanmaarumaayullllore! Ningall kartthaavine vaazhtthuvin.
/tshuddhasthhalatthekku ningallude kaikall uyartthi kartthaavine vaazhtthuvin.
/taakaashavum bhoomiyum srshdicha kartthaav/ sehiyonil ninnu ninne anugrahikkum.

/tkartthaave! Ente sthuthi ninte mumpaake praveshikkukayum/ ninte vachanatthaal enne jeevippikkukayum cheyyaname. Ente apeksha ninte mumpaake praveshikkukayum/ ninte vachanatthaal enne rakshikkukayum cheyyaname.
/tente naavu ninte vachanam ucharikkum/ entennaal ninte kalppanakallellaam neethiyodukoodiyavayaakunnu.
/tninte kalppanakall enne nee padhippikkumpoll/ ente adharangall ninte sthuthikall ucharikkum./ Ninte kalppanakallil nyaan ishdappedunnathinaal/ ninte kai enne sahaayikkaname.
/tente aathmaavu ninte rakshaykkaayittu kaatthirunnu. Ninte vedapramaanam nyaan dhyaanichu./ Ente aathmaavu jeevichu ninne sthuthuthikkukayum/ ninte nyaayavidhi enne sahaayikkukayum cheyyaname.
/tkaanaathepoya aadupole nyaan thettippoyi./Ninte bhrthyane anveshikkaname. Entennaal ninte kalppanakallonnum nyaan marannilla.

/tsakala jaathikallume! Kartthaavine sthuthippin, sakala janangallume! Avane ningall sthuthippin,/ entennaal avante krpa nammude mel balappettirikkunnu./ Avan sathyamaayittu ennekkum kartthaavaakunnu. Daivame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu. Baarekmor.
Shubaho....... Menaolam......
(ambe nbarkkokh)

Maana-va vathsalane kroobesroppe maalaakhaa
Sa-hitham nyangall, vaazhtthum kaadeesh,
Paadum pranamikkum naa-thhaa! Sthuthi the-
nikhilajagannirmmaa-thaa-ve!

pershyan-vibudhanmaar-aadyajanupahaarangallumaayu
Vannullppooki, sambhramasahitham
pranamichuracheythu naa-thhaa sthuthithe nikhilajagannirmmaa-thaa-ve!

Manuja-priyane nindaivathvatthinu kaazhchakalle
Ya-vararppichu, maanikkunnu
Sabhathirujananadinam naa-thhaa! Sthuthithe nikhilajagannirmmaa-thaa-ve!

Prabhayin-suprabhaye-shaashvathathaathaa thanthanayaa!
An-paalettu nee-narajananam
Sthuthiyarullunnengall; naathhaa sthuthithe nikhilajagannirmmaa-thaa-ve!

Pershyan-vibudhanmaar-kaazhchakallangeykkarppichu
Be-thalahemil ghoshi-chevam
Maanavavathsalane! Naathhaa sthuthithe nikhilajagannirmmaa-thaa-ve!

Nin-naamatthil nidritharadiyaar-

Muttunneettin no-vennil yauseppodu cho-nnaall
Neethijnyaa! Betha-lahemil guhayil po-yee-daam
/tilloru paayum-kattilumeeyu-llllaall
/tkkeeyulakatthil-nyaanaashrayahee-na
Lokapuraathanane-guhayil prasavichayya-yyo
Jagatheerakshakane-nyaan pulkkoottil paali-kkum
/thaaleluyyaa-uhaale-lu-yyaa
Baarekmor. Shubaho..........

Bhaagikamaayu drshdaanta-tthil nibiyanmaar moo-lam
Poorvvikathaatharodaayu thaa-than poorvvam bhaashi-chu
/tnammodinnee-yantimakaala-tthil
/tvathsalathanayan-vazhiyaayu bhaashi-chu
Avakaashiyavan thaanmoo-lam nirmmithamaayu lo-kam
Thalahem guhayil jaa-tham cheythonavana-llo
/thaaleluyyaa-uhaaleluyyaa
(thhar gabriyel)

Haa! Balaheenan-nyaan
Naathhaa! Ninne-varnnippaa-n vazhipole
nincharitham vachanaa-theetham.
Aa-daa-mi-nte srashdaave! Poonden
Ninjanmatthil-nyaanaashcha-ryam
vaanavadootha-nmaar jagathee-daahakamaam
ninjvaalaanivaham-tha-nnil
ka-mpam-pookumpoll
bhauthikamudaram-the mathiyaa-yee
Eriyaay/u200bvaannin kathirukallil, krpayaal nee
Kaitthaarathilavalle-tthaa-ngi.

En-vadanam-dee-nam
Daivatthin praa-naathmakanaam-kunyaadin
Maahaathmyatthekkee-rtthi-ppaan
paa-rum-vaa-num nirayum ninneyaa
mariyaamangka-tthil kondaa-di
haa-maanavane-yennavidham-prasavichu
shishupol nee paalull-kko-ndu
Ja-gathee-rakshakane!
Thaavaka maddhyasthha-thayaal shaa-nti
nediya svargee-yanmaarum-bhaumikarum
Sthuthigeetham thava-paa-du-nnu
(eskaatthal vau)

Naa-thhaa! Ee ninjanmatthin-naalli-l
Vaaykallil ninnellaam-stho-thram-the
/tninshreshdhatha thannunnathi kai-vittu
/theenathaye svayamaar-nno-naakum
/tsa-rva praanadane varnnicheedaan
/tmathiyaakum mrthiyu-llllaa-ne-van
ja-nmashreedaayakane! Ninjanmattheyulghoshicheedaan
e-kuka balamenmanathaarinu nin shreshdhathayeshodhikkaa-the
/taa-rdrathaye nyaan ghoshichee-dename
/tdrshyanadrshyan nee-dhanyan-thaan

/taashcharyam gaathram thannil-pu-thran
/tpoornnathayodezhunnalllli paa-rtthaan
/tsa-mpoornnathayodu gaathratthil-vaa-naan
/tmathiyaayu maruveedaa-naa-gaathram
Anyoo-napreethiyodavidadhivaasam cheythaan seemaatheethan
poo-rnnanarathvamodamarumpoll poornnaadheeshathvam poondone
/tvarnnicheedaan mathiyaayo-ne-van
/tseemaatheethanavan-dha-nyan-thaan

/tsaakshaal svargeeyathayil vaa-zhu-mpoll
/tbhaumikanaayone! Stho-thram-the
/tsvargeeyaadya thanoojan sne-ha-tthaal
/taadyajanaayon mariyaa-mee-nnum
Daivatthin shishuvaakunnon perinu yauseppin shishuvaayi
Sve-shdatthaal saakshaal Daivam maanavajananatthe kaikko-ndu
/tnintiruvishdam mahaneeyam-shre-shdham
/tthaavakamaam janmam-dha-nyam-thaan.

/tthaa-theshaathmaja parishuddhaa-thmaave!
/taarambham muthale-stho-thram-the
/tni-nniludichen nalka balam-naa-thhaa
/tparinaamatthollam che-nne-tthaan
Naa-naavidha bhamgikalleyum nihanikkum kuzhimaadam thannil
Ennude balaheenathayolum vaakkukallavasaanicheedumpoll
/tthee-narakatthil rakshithanaayee-daan
/tkrpacheytheedaname ka-rtthaa-ve!
(maanu bar maannoo)

Daaveedin-makall kanni
Janathaamaddhye ni-nnee-dunnu
Kaikallil-me-vunnunni
Thaarkkikaravane choo-zhu-nna-llo
/tpaarkkunne-kan; nerkkunna-nyan
saakshichanyanivan-thaan-dai-vam.

Daaveedin-makall kanni
Namme villichaall sne-ha-tthaal-than
pantiyile-kkeenaallil
Varuvin nammallkkaa-modi-kkaam

thathphalameeshan thaa-ne-nnevam.

Kanyakayaay-nallaaril
Paithaline prasavi-cho-lle-vall
Samgamaraa-hithyatthil
Sthanyavumunniyume-nnaar-ka-ndu
/tathbhuthavaa-rttha! Vismayavaarttha
vaadiganam vaayu moo-dee-da-tte.

Thaathayutham-nee Daivam
Athinaal jaathikallthan na-nda-na-yaam
Thirusabha-ninnudayatthe
Sangkeertthichabhimaa-nam-kollvoo
/tpremam-nalka; kshemam-nalka
Thaldaathaavaam thaa-than-dha-nyan.

Mahithaathmaa-veshaayaa
Vikramiyennaa nee-mashi-haa-ye
Vismaya ja-nmatthaala-
Ngathbhuthamennum haa-ko-ndaa-di
/tavano-veeran; vismaya-nee-yan
eshaayaayulgho-shi-cho-nam.

Doothavaran-mashihaaye
Udayonennaahvaa-nam-cheythu
Illallo-doothanmaar
Kkudayonangane manu-jo-lbhoo-than
/tavano-Daivam; daivolbhoo-than
Athinaal gabriye-lin-naa-thhan.

Kaathathiloo-dullpooki
Baalikathannil va-chanam-vaa-nu
Udarattheenneeppaaril
Kaayikamaayijaa-tham-cheythu
/tshishuvo-vrddhan, paramaashcharyam!
Ikkathha sambhramamaa-rkke-kee-daa.

Aarivanaar-thansoonu?
Mariyaamil samjaa-tham-che-ython
sathyamayan-daivatthee-
Nnudayam cheythoru dai-vam-thanne

Melum keezhum sampoornnam vaazhunnundeeshan

Thaathanthan nikshepam perum nauke shaanti

Nirmmalamaakum maanikyatthin mutthe shaanti
Ninnil jaatham daivasuthan cheythathinaal shaanti

Paadin paadin paadin paadin haaleluyyaa

Ompathumaasam-mariyaamenti
Janakeshan-thanvalamaayu vaa-zh-vo-ne
Therilamarnnon-vaanudaratthil
Thejodhaa-ri paazhtthunikall chu-tti
/tna-ranaayu Daivam
Suthasanchayamotthaadaamine
Samra-kshippaanaa-shcharyam.

Entimariyaam-sarvambharane
Uthghoshi-chaall; spudamavano-de-vam
Unnathasoono-naravamshatthe
Samrakshi-ppaan hithamoduthaa-na-tthi
/tme-yyaarnnone!
Nikhilaadheeshaathmajane! Nin
Maathaa-vaakum nyaa-n dhanya

Paartthappoll-vaanavaraam eerayarum-dootharude
Vyoohamathum vannetthi kaahallanaa-datthode
haaleluyyaa-uhaaleluyyaa thaazhmavari-chon dhanyan

Srshdikalle rakshippaan daaveedin nandaniyil
Samjaatham cheythonaam mishihaaye bethalahem
Pookkudane kaankenna-ngidayaroda-thyaanandam
Haaleluyyaa-uhaaleluyyaa-maalaakhaa-yariyichu.
(aabo ksabu vo)

Kathirereedum kathironee-lokam darshippaanetthi
/tprekshakalokatthi-nnakshikall maanchaay/u200bvaan
Nararoopatthil sasneham-cheythaanudayam lokatthil.

Mahimaavin mahitham roopam-mahimaaveemaanushanekaan
/tmaanushaveshatthil-vellivaayee mannil
Poornnam thaatheshanuthullyan-poornnam nammallkkum thullyan.

Svargeeyasuthan preshithanaayu meleennum bhoolokatthil
/tunnathasvargatthil bhaumikareyetti
daivikamaambaandhavameki-daivatthe preenippikkaan.

Eritheejvaalayileriyaayvaan sroppenmaar vadanam moodi
/tnirmmala naadatthaa-laarekeertthikku-
Nnavane shishupol saadhusthree-thaaraattitthaalolichu.

Grhayoothhattheyaamgyatthaal-kaalaavasthhithiyullavaamma-
Ttathbhuthavegatthil-paayicheedunnon
Neentee shishupol svakajaniyaal-shreeyaarnnoru bethalahemil.
(hadau aamme)

Vaazhtthidumee-nivahatthil-krpa cheyyenam

Ekbo
(aabo ksabu vo)

Kartthaave! Nalkaashvaasam-nin salbhavanangallkkullllil
/tvaangippoyorkkaay-krpayee nyangallkkum
Adiyaarkkumavarkkum pattum-kuttangalle maatteedenam
Kuriye........ Kuriye..........Kuriye..
Nyangallude kartthaave!....
(bkool medem)

Kartthaave! Nalkaashvaasam
Uththhaanatthin naallollam
Thaathkkaalikamaamijeevan
Vittapithaakkallkkum bhraathrjanangallkkum
Kaantiyezhunnarakallkkullllil nalkeedaashvaasam
Avareyorkkum naall kabarullllasthhikallariyenam
/tninkalpana manmayaraamaa-
/tdaamyarkkuyirekeedumpoll
Kaantiyaninyittavar ninno-
Doppam manavarayil pooki
Uyirekum ninne sthothram cheyyenam.
Baarekmor. Shubaho..

Aarkkaayu kaazhchakallivideyana-
Ykkunno bhaagyamavannettam
Melsvargatthilavannormmayathundaakum
Gothrapperukallormmakkaayu kartthaavin mumpil
Kaanmaankallukallil moosha kotthiyathorkkumpoll
/tningall than mrtharperukalle
/torkkaanum palllliyilivide
Ezhuthaanum melsvargatthil
Mashihaathanvaravilthanno-
Davar modippaanum cherppin pristhaayil
Moriyo.....
Maar baalaayiyude bovusso

Karunaniranyavane!-punaruththhaanatthil
Ninnude srshdiye nee-puthuthaakkeedaname.

Ninnil sharanatthaal-nidrayilaayu ninte
Varavinu kaattheedum-mrtharil kaniyaname.

Avarabaraahatthi-nteyumisahaakkudeyum
Yaakkobinnudeyum-madiyil paarkkaname

Vannavanum varuvo-num mrthar thannuyirum
Sthuthanennu shareeraa-thmaakkall paadaname.
Haale-haale-haale.......Daivame! Ninakku sthuthi. Haale-haale-haale.. ..Daivame! Ninakku sthuthi.
Haale-haale haale......Daivame! Ninakku sthuthi.
Karunayulllla daivame! Ninte karunayaal nyangallodu karunacheyyaname.

Naam daivatthinte makkallaayitthiruvaan/ jeevichirunnappoll namme padhippichavaraaya nammude pithaakkanmaare /kurbaanakallilum praarththhanakallilum naam orkkanam. Azhivillaattha lokamaaya svargaraajyatthil/ neethimaanmaarodum punyavaanmaarodumkoode/ daivaputhran avare aashvasippikkum / kartthaave krpa cheythu sahaayikkaname.
Vi. Mariyaaminte paatt
Lookkosu 1: 46-55

Mariyaam paranyathentennaal, ente dehi kartthaavine pukazhtthunnu. Ente aathmaavu enne jeevippikkunnavanaaya daivatthil santoshichu, entennaal avan thante daasiyude thaazhchaye nokkikkandirikkunnu. Kandaalum ithumuthal sakala vamshangallum enikku bhaagyam tharum.

Entennaal shakthimaanum, thante naamam parishuddhavum aayirikkunnavan valiya kaaryangall engkal pravartthichirikkunnu. Avante karuna avane bhayappedunnavarude mel thalamurakallaayum vamshangallaayum undaakunnu.

Avan thante bhujam kondu jayamundaakki: Thangallude hrdaya vichaaratthil ahangkaarikallaayavare chinnichu; avan balavaanmaare simhaasanangallil ninnu marichidukayum, thaazhmayullllavare uyartthukayum cheythu.

Avan vishappullllavare nanmakallkondu sammpoornnaraakkukayum, sampannanmaare vyarththhamaayi ayaykkukayum cheythu, avan thante daasanaaya israayeline sahaayikkukayum nammude pithaakkanmaaraaya abraahaaminodum avante santathiyodum samsaaricha prakaaram ennekkum thante karunaye orkkukayum cheythu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho..
Menaolam.
Maavoorbo

Haa! Nin bhaagyam daaveedin makall mariyaame
Daivam ninnilninnu shareeram poondi-
Ttaadaamyareyadimayozhichellaam veendu.

Nibiyanmaar shleehanmaar sahadenmaar nayavaa-
Nmaaraachaaryanmaar leviyaraayore!
Praarththhippin mishihaakrpachey/u200bvaan nyangademel
Baarekmor shubaho...

Ningaathram bhakshichum ninraktham paanam
Cheythum sharanatthaal mrtharaayorkkaashvaa-
Satthodormmayumalivodullavaakken naathhaa!
Menaolam.

Maalaakhaa naathhaa! Ninnude maathaa thaanum
Parishuddhanmaarumanaykkum praarththhanayaal
Shushrooshakall kaikkondarull cheyyenam. Aammeen.
132-aam masumoor
Sahodaranmaar orumichu vasikkunnath/ ethra nanmayum ethra saundaryavumaakunnu.
Athu aharonte thalayinmelum/ avante angkiyude nenchinmel veenukidakkunna thaadiyaaya avante thaadiyinmelum olikkunna/ thailam poleyum/ sehiyon malamel pozhiyunna/ hermmon manyupoleyum aakunnu.
Entennaal avide kartthaav/ ennekkum anugahattheyum jeevaneyum kalppichu. Daivame sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
Baarekmor - shubaho - menaolam
Pothuvaaya eniyono
Daivamaathaavinu ormmayum, avallude praarththhanayaal namukku sahaayangallum undaakatte.
Neethimaanmaarkku ormmayum, avarude praarththhanayaal namukku sahaayangallum undaakatte.
Deerghadarshimaarudeyum, shleehanmaarudeyum, sahadenmaarudeyum praarththhana namukku kottayaayirikkatte.
Kartthaave! Ninte sahadenmaarude thuramukhatthinum ninte snehithanmaarude koodaarangallkkum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname.
Dayayullllavanum, karuna niranyirikkunnavanumaayullllove! Ninte nyaayavisthaara divasatthil nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.
Thanne villikkunna paapikallil ninnu thante karunaye virodhikkaatthavan vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu.
Baarekmor-shubaho..
Kartthaave, vishvaasamulllla sabhayude makkallkk/ nalla ormmayundaakaname. Menaolam..
Ninte shreshdhatha udikkunna divasatthil/ avar ninte valathubhaagatthu nilkkumaaraakaname.
Mattoru eniyono
Kanyakayaaya daivamaathaave! Ellaa kaalatthum ellaa neratthum ninte praarththhana nyangallkku kottayaayirikkaname.
(kartthaave) ellaa naazhikayilum nyangallkkaayu kenikall vaykkunna dushdane ninte parishuddhanmaarude praarththhanayaal nyangallil ninnu maayichu kallayaname.
Nyangallude kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaa! Ninte sleebaa+ nyangallkku kottayaayirikkukayum, athinakatthu nyangall maraykkappedukayum cheyyaname.
Vachanamaaya Yeshu thampuraane! Jeevanodirikkunnavare ninte sleebaayaal+ kaatthukollllukayum, marichupoyavare ninte karunayaal punyappedutthukayum cheyyaname.
Naam jeevanodirikkunna naall okkeyum, ellaayippozhum pithaavineyum, puthraneyum, vishuddharoohaayeyum sthuthichu vandichu mahathvappedutthanam.
Ettavum karunayullllavanaaya nyangallude daivame! Nee ezhunnallllunna aa ninte valiya divasatthil ninte valatthubhaagatthu nyangalle nirutthaname.
Ee samayatthu ninakku sthuthi paaduvaan nyangalle nee yogyaraakkiyirikkakondu ninte raajyam anubhavippaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname.

Nyangallude maranatthinteyum jeevanteyum naathhanaaya kartthaave! Ninte krpa nyangalludemel undaayi nyangalludeyum nyangallude marichupoyavarudeyum aathmaakkallinmel karuna cheyyaname. Kartthaave! Krpa cheythu sahaayikkaname.
148-aam masoomoor
Urangiyavare! Ningall unarnnezhunnettu sthuthippin aakaashatthilninnu kartthaavine sthuthippin. Unnathangallil avane sthuthippin.
Avante sakaladoothanmaarume! Avane sthuthippin. Avante sakala sainyangallume/ avane sthuthippin.

Aadithyachandranmaare! Avane sthuthippin/ prakaashamulllla sakala nakshathrangallume! Avane sthuthippin/ aakaashangallude aakaashangallum,/ aakaashangallkku meetheyulllla vellllangallume! Avane sthuthippin;/ ava kartthaavinte naamatthe sthuthikkatte.
Entennaal avan paranyu; ava undaayi/ avan kalppichu; ava srshdikkappettu. Avan avaye ennekkumaayi sthhirappedutthi / niyamam nishchayichu; /athu azhiyunnathumalla.
Bhoomiyilninnu mahaasarppangallum, ellaa aazhangallum,/agniyum, kalmazhayum,/ uracha vellllavum, himavum,/ avante vachanapravartthiyaaya kaattukallum, kodungkaattukallume/kartthaavine sthuthippin.
Parvathangallum, sakala kunnukallum,/ phalavrkshangallum, sakala kaarakilukallum,/ mrgangallum sakala kannukaalikallum,/ izhajantukkallum, pakshikallum paravakallume/ (kartthaavine sthuthippin)

Bhoomiyile raajaakkanmaarum, sakala janangallum,/ bhoomiyile prabhukkanmaarum, sakala nyaayaadhipanmaarum, /shishukkallum, kanyakamaarum,/ vrddhanmaarum, yauvanakkaarum/kartthaavinte naamatthe sthuthikkatte.

Entennaal avante naamammaathram valiyathaakunnu./Avante mahathvam bhoomiyilum, aakaashatthilumund./ Avan thante janatthinte kompum,/ thante sakala neethimaanmaarkkum,/ thanikkaduttha janamaaya israayel makkallkkum mahathvavum uyartthunnu.

Kartthaavinu puthiya paattum, / neethimaanmaarude sabhayil avante sthuthiyum paaduvin. Israayel thante srashdaavil santoshikkukayum,/ sehiyonte puthranmaar thangallude raajaavil aanandikkukayum cheyyatte.

Avar thappukallaalum, chathuratthappukallaalum avante naamatthe sthuthikkukayum,/ veenakallaal avanu paadukayum cheyyatte. Entennaal kartthaavu thante janatthil ishdappedunnu./ Avan daridranmaarkku raksha kodukkukayum cheyyunnu.
Neethimaanmaar bahumaanatthil balappedum,/ avar thangallude kattilukallinmel avane sthuthikkukayum,/ thangallude kandhangallkondu daivatthe pukazhtthukayum cheyyum.

Purajaathikallkku prathikriyayum,/ janatthinu shaasanayum koduppaanum,/ avarude raajaakkanmaare aalaatthukallkondum,/ avarude maanyanmaare irumpuchangalakallkondum bandhippaanum,/ ezhuthappettirikkunna nyaayavidhi avarudemel nadatthuvaanum,/ avante sakala neethimaanmaarkkum mahathvam undaakuvaanum/ avarude kaikallil irumunavaall und.
Kartthaavine avante shuddhasthhalatthu sthuthippin./Avante shakthiyude aakaashatthattil avane sthuthippin
Avante vallabhathvatthil avane sthuthippin./Avante shreshdhathayude bahuthvatthil avane sthuthippin./ Kompinte shabdatthaal avane sthuthippin. Thamburukallaalum veenakallaalum avane sthuthippin.

Thappukallaalum chathuratthappukallaalum avane sthuthippin. Maadhuryamulllla kampikallaal avane sthuthippin./Naadamulllla kaitthaallangallaal avane sthuthippin./ Shabdatthaalum aarppuvilliyaalum avane sthuthippin. Ellaa shvaasavum kartthaavine sthuthikkatte.

Sakala jaathikallume! Kartthaavine sthuthippin./Sakala janangallume! Avane sthuthippin./ Entennaal avante krpa nammudemel balappettirikkunnu./ Avan sathyamaayittu ennekkum kartthaavaakunnu./ Daivame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho...... Menaolam.

Thrithvatthinu sthuthi. Thrithvatthinu sthuthi. Sthuthikkappettathum, unmayaayathum, aadiyum antavumillaatthathumaaya thrithvatthe nyangall sthuthikkunnu. Daivame! Ellaa neratthum sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.

Ninvalamaayu raajabhaaminiyum.
/tninnazhakarachan mohippaan-haa-haa
/tnin janamorkkaaykkuka pithrgrhavum.

Ninniludichorekasuthan
Thrkkarall nyangallilalivaan than
Pakkalapekshayanaykkenam.

Daivatthin maathaa-mariyaamminnum nibiya-
Nmaarkkum shleehanmaarkkum nal sahadenmaarkkum
Sabhayin makkallkko-kkeykkum kaalam thorum
Ennekkum nallo-rormmayathundaakatte.
Barekmor. Shubaho.

Thiruvullllatthaal ka-nyakayaam mariyaammeennull
Jaathanathaayu jaathi-kkaare vazhineraakki.
Rakshichavall thannor-mmaykkaunnathyam cherttha
Suthanaayu sthothram, praar-ththhikkattavall nyangallkkaay

Maar apreminte bovoosso

Kartthaave krpa cheyyaname
Maathrvishuddha praarththhanayaal
Nin maathaavum kaadeeshan-
Maarum cheyyum yaachippaal

Mariyaaminnaayu shlommo va-
Nnariyichoraa maalaakhaa
Daivam yojippaayennaayu
Vannarivingekeedenam.

Panineer haananiyaadyarmel
Veezhtthiyoraamaalaakhaa thaan
Mrthar thannasthhikkoottatthil
Krpayaam neer veezhttheedenam.

Kartthaave! Krpacheyyaname
Maathrvishuddhaabhyarththhanayaal
Punyam nyangallkkum vaangi-
Ppoyorkkum nalkeedenam.
